name: Spinach and Mushroom Frittata
author: Ben S.
summary: Looking for a vegetable with super health powers? Try spinach. It's packed with vitamins, minerals and antioxidants that protect you all your life.
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and squeezed thoroughly to remove liquid
¾ cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese
½ cup finely chopped scallions with some green tops
1 pinch Salt and pepper, to taste
directions: In a large bowl, whisk together all ingredients until well mixed
Spray a 9-inch pie plate with cooking spray and fill with the spinach mixture
Bake for 30 minutes, or until browned and set
Let cool for 20 minutes, cut in wedges and serve
